I needed a new bathrobe to replace my tattered, worn out terry-cloth robe. I have young kids so bathrobes are both a necessity and a hazard. My 2 year old tends to yank open the robe at the top or the whole robe just flaps open or unties and any hopes for modesty go out the window.  This kimono style robe solves that issue with two ties - one on the inside and the other on the external side. It also has two belt loops that are pretty low for my short waisted self, but work fine with the included belt. The second belt loop on the right is immediately beside the external tie strap so it’s to miss.  The material feels AMAZING and though it feels cold when I first put it on, it matches my body temperature and I feel comfortable in it even in the cold winter mornings (in my temperature controlled home).  I wasn’t sure which size to order. For reference, my measurements are 36-28-36, so I am on the large side of medium or the small side of large according to their size chart. I went ahead and ordered the large and I’m glad I did. Once I tie all the straps and the belt, it’s not quite snug around my body, but if it was any tighter I would probably pull out seams and the fabric every time I sat down.  I’ve owned multiple robes over the years include kimono and yukata style robes and I think this may be my new favorite. The color, the feel, the construction, and the practicality are all on point.  I do have one point of feedback that is not star-losing-worthy but a mild irritation. There are no pockets. It will probably keep the robe nicer over the years as a result, but the added function would be a nice convenience.  All in all, highly recommend.
